message_1: A student needs to determine the concentration of a sulfuric acid solution using a sodium hydroxide solution of known concentration. The student performs a titration and records that it took 27.5 milliliters of the sodium hydroxide solution to neutralize 25 milliliters of the sulfuric acid solution. What is the concentration (in moles per liter) of the sulfuric acid solution?
message_2: To determine the concentration of the sulfuric acid solution, we need to know the concentration of the sodium hydroxide solution. Please provide the concentration of the sodium hydroxide solution.
